description: Warm up with a big bowl of flavour-packed chilli con carne, with a twist. This delicious easy dinner idea is made even better with eggs, and is ready in 30 minutes.
name: Chilli con carne with eggs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
420 g can no added salt red kidney beans

recipeInstructions.text: Using the back of a spoon, make four indents in mince mixture. Crack one egg into each indent, then cook, covered, for 2 minutes or until eggs are cooked to your liking. Scatter over coriander and serve with tortillas.
